body_html:
Hi, the symbolic link command was:

ln -s ../ops/_cudnn_rnn_ops.so _cudnn_rnn_ops.so

executed in /usr/local/tensorflow-1.4.0-rc0/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/contrib/cudnn_rnn/python/layers

Also, modifying the cudnn_rnn.py file so that lines 32-33 read:

_cudnn_rnn_ops_so = loader.load_op_library( resource_loader.get_path_to_datafile("../ops/_cudnn_rnn_ops.so"))

fixes the problem as well.
body_text:
Hi, the symbolic link command was:
ln -s ../ops/_cudnn_rnn_ops.so _cudnn_rnn_ops.so
executed in /usr/local/tensorflow-1.4.0-rc0/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/contrib/cudnn_rnn/python/layers
Also, modifying the cudnn_rnn.py file so that lines 32-33 read:
_cudnn_rnn_ops_so = loader.load_op_library( resource_loader.get_path_to_datafile("../ops/_cudnn_rnn_ops.so"))
fixes the problem as well.
body:
Hi, the symbolic link command was:

`ln -s ../ops/_cudnn_rnn_ops.so _cudnn_rnn_ops.so`

executed in `/usr/local/tensorflow-1.4.0-rc0/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/contrib/cudnn_rnn/python/layers`

Also, modifying the `cudnn_rnn.py` file so that lines 32-33 read:

`_cudnn_rnn_ops_so = loader.load_op_library(
    resource_loader.get_path_to_datafile("../ops/_cudnn_rnn_ops.so"))`

fixes the problem as well.
